snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron has taken the first formal step toward a constitutional change that would allow girls and women to ascend to the British throne before their younger brothers.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron has taken the first formal step toward a constitutional change that would allow girls and women to ascend to the British throne before their younger brothers.

headline.main: Britain: First Steps on Change for Women Ascending to Throne
headline.print_headline: Britain: First Steps on Change For Women Ascending to Throne
